summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件创建选择框。Use the control to create a selection box. 通过在开始标记和结束` 每一项由一个对象表示。Each item is represented by a object. 若要指定为控件中的每个项显示的文本, 您可以设置项的属性, 或者只是在开始和结束`To specify the text that is displayed for each item in the control, you can set the property of the item, or simply place text between the opening and closing ` 通过设置项的属性, 可将值与与文本不同的项关联。By setting the property of the item, you can associate a value with the item that is different from the text. 若要在默认情况下从列表中选择一个项 , 请将该项的`true`属性设置为。To select an item from the list by default, set the property of the item to `true`. 可以通过 设置和属性来控制控件的外观和行为。You can control the appearance and behavior of the control by setting the and properties. 属性指定控件的高度 (行)。The property specifies the height (in rows) of the control. 属性指定是否可以在控件中同时选择多个项。 The property specifies whether more than one item can be concurrently selected in the control. 默认情况下, 该控件显示为下拉列表框。By default, the control is displayed as a drop-down list box. 如果允许多重选择 (通过将属性设置为`true`) 或指定大于一行的高度 (通过将属性设置为大于`1`的值), 则控件将显示为列表框。If you allow multiple selections (by setting the property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box. 若要确定单项选择控件中的选定项, 请使用属性获取选定项的索引。To determine the selected item in a single-selection control, use the property to get the index of the selected item. 然后, 可以使用此值从集合中检索项。You can then use this value to retrieve the item from the collection. 若要确定允许多个选择的控件中的选定项, 请循环访问该集合并测试每个项的属性。To determine the selected items from an control that allows multiple selections, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item. 类提供两个属性以支持数据绑定。The class provides two properties to support data binding. 若要将数据绑定到实现接口的任何对象 ( 如、 和) 或接口, 请使用属性指定要绑定到的数据源。To bind data to any object that implements the interface (such as , , and ), or the interface, use the property to specify the data source to bind to. 设置属性时, 必须手动编写代码以执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding. 若要自动将控件绑定到数据源控件所表示的数据源, 请使用属性, 并将其值设置为要使用的数据源控件的属性。To automatically bind an control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the property and set its value to the property of the data source control to use. 设置属性时 , 控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 因此, 无需显式调用方法。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method. 您还可以通过设置和 属性来指定数据源中的哪些字段绑定到控件中某一项的和属性。You can also specify which fields in the data source bind to the and properties of an item in the control by setting the and properties, respectively. 如果数据源包含多个数据源, 请使用属性指定要绑定到控件的特定源。If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如, 如果具有包含多个表的对象, 则必须使用属性指定要绑定到控件的表。For example, if you have a object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control with the property. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过显式声明控件中显示的项来创建控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control by explicitly declaring the items that appear in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[htmlselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/htmlselect/CS/htmlselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[htmlselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/htmlselect/VB/htmlselectvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何通过将控件绑定到数据源来创建控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control by binding the control to a data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectDataSource/CS/htmlselectdatasourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectDataSource/VB/htmlselectdatasourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定控件的数据源。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source for an control. 属性设置为用于检索数据的控件的属性。 The property is set to the property of the control used to retrieve the data. 加载页面后, 控件将自动绑定到由控件指定的数据源, 并向用户显示数据。When the page is loaded, the control automatically binds to the data source specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelect.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelect.DataSourceID/CS/htmlselect.datasourceidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelect.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelect.DataSourceID/VB/htmlselect.datasourceidvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定要绑定到控件的数据源。 Use the property to specify the data source to bind to the control. 数据源必须是实现接口的集合 ( 如、 或) 或接口。A data source must be a collection that implements either the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface. 设置属性时, 必须手动编写代码以执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果数据源包含多个数据集 (如具有多个表的对象), 请使用属性指定要绑定到控件的数据集。If the data source contains multiple sets of data, such as a object with multiple tables, use the property to specify which data set to bind to the control. 通过分别设置 和属性,可以指定数据源中的哪些字段绑定到控件中每个项的和属性。You can specify which fields from the data source to bind to the and properties of each item in the control by setting the and properties, respectively. 或者, 可以使用属性自动绑定到数据源控件所表示的数据源。Alternately, you can use the property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control. 设置属性时, 数据列表控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 无需编写显式调用方法的代码。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 如果为属性和属性指定值, ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源并且将引发异常。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定要绑定到控件的信息源。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the source of information to bind to the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性设置或访问控件应用于检索其数据源的数据源控件的属性。 Use the property to set or access the property of the data source control that the control should use to retrieve its data source. 属性引用的数据源控件可以是实现该接口的任何控件。The data source control referenced by the property can be any control that implements the interface. 数据源控件必须与引用它的控件位于同一命名容器中, 或位于控件的父控件中。The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the control that references it or in a parent control of the control. 为此属性指定值时, 控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you specify a value for this property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 无需编写显式调用方法的代码。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 或者, 可以使用属性指定要绑定到控件的值的源。Alternately, you can use the property to specify the source of values to bind to an control. 数据源必须是实现接口的集合 ( 如、 或) 或接口。The data source must be a collection that implements the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface. 设置属性时, 必须手动编写代码以执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果为属性和属性指定值, ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源并且将引发异常。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定控件的数据源。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source for an control. 属性设置为用于检索数据的控件的属性。 The property is set to the property of the control used to retrieve the data. 加载页面后, 控件将自动绑定到由控件指定的数据源, 并向用户显示数据。When the page is loaded, the control automatically binds to the data source specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定数据源中要绑定到控件中每个项的属性的字段。 Use the property to specify which field from the data source to bind to the property of each item in the control. 此属性通常用于为属性提供与属性的值不同的值。This property is commonly used to provide a value for the property that differs from the value of the property. 类提供两个属性, 用于指定要绑定到的数据源。The class provides two properties for specifying the data source to bind to. 属性允许您将控件绑定到实现或接口的任何集合 (如、或)。 The property allows you to bind an control to any collection that implements the or interfaces (such as , , or ). 使用属性指定数据源时, 必须显式调用方法, 将控件及其属性绑定到数据源。When you use the property to specify the data source, you must explicitly call the method to bind the control and its property to the data source. 属性允许您将控件绑定到表示数据源的数据源控件。 The property allows you to bind an control to a data source control that represents a data source. 使用属性指定数据源时 , 控件及其属性会自动绑定到数据源控件。When you use the property to specify the data source, the control and its property automatically bind to the data source control. 因此, 无需显式调用方法。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性来指定数据源中要绑定到控件中每个项的属性的字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to specify the field from the data source to bind to the property of each item in the control. span.span: Restores the control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用, 不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过, 控件开发人员可以重写此方法, 以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 控件的视图状态将存储为对象。 The control's view state is stored as a object. 对象的字段保存控件的基视图状态。The field of the object holds the control's base view state. 对象的字段保存 由属性表示的集合。 The field of the object holds the collection represented by the property. 对象的字段保存由属性表示的所选索引。 The field of the object holds the selected indices represented by the property. 方法调用基类的方法来还原控件的基视图状态。 The method calls the base class's method to restore the control's base view state. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能。 The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 请确保调用基类的方法, 以便正确管理控件的视图状态。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's view state is properly managed.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

summary.span: 这使您可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件中的选定项在向服务器的各次发送过程之间发生更改时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the selected items in the control change between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 此事件仅在用户启动到服务器的 post 时引发, 如单击 "提交" 按钮。This event is raised only when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a Submit button. 此事件不会导致发送到服务器。This event does not cause a post to the server to occur. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用视图状态, 事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 当用户更改控件中的选定内容时, 可以使用此事件在控件上执行数据验证。You can use this event to perform data validation on the control when the user changes the selection in the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 控件的事件指定和编写事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of the control. 事件处理程序确定所选的项是否相互兼容。The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectOnServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectOnServerChange/CS/htmlselectonserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectOnServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectOnServerChange/VB/htmlselectonserverchangevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectServerChange/CS/htmlselectserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectServerChange/VB/htmlselectserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的选定项的序号索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the ordinal index of the selected item in an control.

value.span: 控件中的选定项的序号索引。

span.span: The ordinal index of the selected item in an control.

value.span: 值 指示未选择任何项。

span.span: A value of indicates that no item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于确定单选控件中选定项的索引。 The property is commonly used to determine the index of the selected item in a single-selection control. 然后, 可以使用此索引检索集合中的项。This index can then be used to retrieve the item from the collection. 如果将`true`属性设置为, 指示可以同时选择多个项, 则属性将包含第一个选定项的索引。 If the property is set to `true`, indicating that multiple items can be concurrently selected, the property contains the index of the first selected item. 若要确定允许多个同时选择的控件中的选定项, 请循环访问该集合并测试每个项的属性。To determine the selected items from an control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item. > [!CAUTION] > 可以不选择任何项。It is possible to have no item selected. 如果未选择任何项, 则属性包含的`-1`值。If no item is selected, the property contains a value of `-1`. 这通常发生在第一次加载页面并且默认情况下未选择项目的情况下。This commonly occurs when the page first loads and an item is not selected by default. 提供代码以测试此值, 然后引用集合中的项。Provide code to test this value before referencing the item in the collection. 否则, 如果索引超出集合的范围, 则会引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown if the index is out of the range of the collection. 默认情况下, 该控件显示为下拉列表框。By default, the control is displayed as a drop-down list box. 如果允许多重选择 (通过将属性设置为`true`) 或指定大于一行的高度 (通过将属性设置为大于`1`的值), 则控件将显示为列表框。If you allow multiple selections (by setting the property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box. 如果显示下拉列表框, 则始终选中项。If a drop-down list box is displayed, an item is always selected. 如果显示列表框, 则可以通过将属性设置为`-1`, 以编程方式清除所有项中的选定内容。If a list box is displayed, you can programmatically clear the selection from all items by setting the property to `-1`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定控件中选定项的索引。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the selected item in the control. 然后, 使用索引从集合中检索所选的项。The index is then used to retrieve the selected item from the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/CS/htmlselectsingleselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/VB/htmlselectsingleselectvb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 控件中选定项的值。

span.span: The value of the selected item in the control.

value.span: 如果控件中未选定任何项，则返回 。

span.span: If no item is selected in the control, is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于获取属性所引用的项的值。 The property is commonly used to get the value of the item referenced by the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件中未选定任何项，则返回 。If no item is selected in the control, is returned. 如果将此属性设置为值, 则会使用列表中包含该值的第一项的索引来更新属性。If you set this property to a value, the property is updated with the index of the first item in the list that contains that value. 如果未找到匹配值, 则属性保持不变。If no matching value is found, the property is left unchanged. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性获取控件中选定项的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to get the value of the selected item in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/CS/htmlselectsingleselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/VB/htmlselectsingleselectvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 属性被设置为大于 控件中的项数或小于 的项。

span.span: The property was set to an item greater than the number of items in the control or less than .
